name: Sky Steed
target: a creature you are mounted upon
text: The target sprouts angelic wings and gains a fly speed equal to its base speed with average maneuverability. It also gains a bonus on Fly checks equal to your caster level.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 你的坐骑生出天使之翼，并获得等同于它的基础速度的飞行速度，机动性为普通，并且还在飞行检定中获得等同于你的施法者等级的加值。
